dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Does not appear to prefer a particular biotope.  Lives in groups and feeds on insects.  Its need for space makes it difficult to maintain in the aquarium (Ref. 12225).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: South America:  coastal streams of the Guiana Shield.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Coastal streams of the Guiana Shield: Guyana, French Guiana and Suriname.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Habitat
dataObjects.title: Environment
dataObjects.description: benthopelagic; freshwater; pH range: 5.6 - 6.8; dH range: 10
